title.rendered: Suntory Whisky Hibiki 17 Years Old Museum Of Art

content.rendered: This particular Hibiki 17 Years old was released in order to celebrate the grand opening of the Suntory Art Museum (opened in 1961). As everything else with the name Hibiki on it, this is top quality stuff, and also very rare.

excerpt.rendered: This particular Hibiki 17 Years old was released in order to celebrate the grand opening of the Suntory Art Museum (opened in 1961). As everything else with the name Hibiki on it, this is top quality stuff, and also very rare.
